Class BaseComponent

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.components.BaseComponent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AlienLifeSupportComponent, BatteryComponent, CabinComponent, CannonComponent, EmptyComponent, EngineComponent, ShieldComponent, StartingCabinComponent, StorageComponent, StructuralComponent
public abstract class BaseComponent extends Object implements Serializable
Abstract class representing a server side component tile.

  • Method Details

    • getID

      public int getID()

    • getConnectors

      public ConnectorType[] getConnectors()
      Returns:
      Array of ConnectorType, one for each cardinal direction starting clockwise from the top.

    • getRotation

      public ComponentRotation getRotation()
      Returns:
      Rotation of the component, given as the clockwise angle from the up position

    • rotate

      public void rotate(ComponentRotation rotation)
      Rotates the component.
      Parameters:
      rotation - ComponentRotation New component rotation.

    • verify

      public boolean verify(SpaceShip ship)
      Verifies the component is properly connected to its neighbours.
      Parameters:
      ship - SpaceShip Ship from which the component retrieves its neighbours.
      Returns:
      Whether the component is properly connected or not.

    • getConnector

      public ConnectorType getConnector(ComponentRotation direction)
      Returns the connector at a specific direction of the component, given the rotation of the component inside the ship
      Parameters:
      direction - ComponentRotation Rotation requested.
      Returns:
      ConnectorType Connector at that specific rotation.

    • getCoords

      public ShipCoords getCoords()
      Returns:
      coords of the component inside the ship

    • powerable

      public boolean powerable()
      Returns:
      Whether the component can be powered or not.

    • onCreation

      public abstract void onCreation(SpaceShip ship, ShipCoords coords)
      Logic when component is placed in ship.
      Parameters:
      ship - SpaceShip Ship where the component was placed.
      coords - ShipCoords Coordinates where it was placed.

    • onDelete

      public abstract void onDelete(SpaceShip ship)
      Logic when component is removed from ship.
      Parameters:
      ship - SpaceShip Ship where the component was placed.

    • getClientComponent

      public abstract ClientComponent getClientComponent()
      Returns:
      ClientComponent

    • check

      public abstract void check(ComponentVisitor v)
      Checks the component using the visitor provided.
      Parameters:
      v - ComponentVisitor Visitor to show component to.

    • getConnectedComponents

      public BaseComponent[] getConnectedComponents(SpaceShip ship)
      Checks if adjacent components have compatible connectors, if true adds component to an array
      Parameters:
      ship - SpaceShip Ship to retrieve connected components.
      Returns:
      Array of BaseComponent guaranteed to be connected to this.
